message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,000,000. It's a great deal for both of us, considering the value it holds for you. Let me know your thoughts!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $900,000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with my budget.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer. However, I'm still hoping to get closer to my desired price. I'm willing to come down to $950,000. This would still be a good deal for you, considering the value of the product. Let me know if this works for you.
I understand your position, Alice. I'll make one last attempt to find a middle ground. How about $925,000 for the product? I believe this is a fair compromise considering its value to me.
